CustomField.description: populates the values of either "Inside SLA" or "Outside SLA" in the field [Contracts Received SLA] The conditions for each value are below: "Inside SLA" = [Contract Reviewed] is blank AND NOW() is either equal to or less than the [Contract Review Target Time] "Outside SLA" = [Contract Reviewed] is blank AND NOW() is greater than the [Contract Review Target Time] This field is not on page layouts but used in reports.
CustomField.formula:
IF( Contract_Reviewed__c =False && NOW()<= Contract_Review_Target_Time__c,'Inside SLA',
IF( Contract_Reviewed__c =False && NOW()> Contract_Review_Target_Time__c,'Outside SLA',''))
CustomField.label: Contracts Received SLA
